item.description:
Learn to let go of your ego by letting go of your type fixation. Herb will talk about how each type can loosen its fixation of type and how to live from a more spiritual perspective, freer from emotional pain, demands, and reactions.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, author of 2 books on the topic, therapist, coach and leader of over 2000 Enneagram workshops in the last 23 years.

Cost $40

1-4 pm

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: It's 26 Church St instead of 32, adjacent to main parking lot in Watertown Square
item.name: Enneagram and Spirituality
